mapper.insert: INSERT INTO airport_search_stats (airport_id, std_date, search_count) VALUES (#{airportId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), #{count}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE search_count = search_count + #{count}
mapper.select: SELECT airport_id AS airportId, SUM(search_count) AS searchCount FROM airport_search_stats WHERE std_date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY airport_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM airport_search_stats WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAYS), '%Y%m%d') > std_date
